article: Once upon a time, there was no donkey in a small village. One day a merchant brought one to the village. But the _ had a _ master. So one day it ran away into a forest and decided to stay there. But soon a tiger saw it and immediately _ at it. At once the donkey started to cry as loud as it could. The tiger was so _ by the donkey's action _ it ran away with fright . Not long afterwards the tiger met a fox. _ out of breath , it told the fox what had happened . Then the tiger _ the fox to the place _ it had met the donkey. When the fox saw the donkey, it laughed and said, "That's only a _ donkey and it only eats grass . Come, let's kill it _ supper. When the donkey saw them coming along , it quickly got a plan. "Hello, old friend! How nice to see you, and how nice _ you to bring me supper, my favorite food -- tiger meat." Hearing this, the tiger was very _ as well as angry. "I'll teach you a lesson." It _ angrily at the fox, and _ one jump, killed it. Then it ran away as fast as it could.
